column2: SELECT s.apogee_id, s.ra, s.dec, s.glon, s.glat, s.vhelio_avg, s.vscatter, s.field, params.*, paramerrs.*, elems.*, elemerrs.*, dbo.fApogeeAspcapFlagN(a.aspcapflag), dbo.fApogeeStarFlagN(s.starflag) FROM apogeeStar s JOIN aspcapStar a on a.apstar_id = s.apstar_id CROSS APPLY dbo.fAspcapParams(a.aspcap_id) params CROSS APPLY dbo.fAspcapParamErrs(a.aspcap_id) paramerrs CROSS APPLY dbo.fAspcapElems(a.aspcap_id) elems CROSS APPLY dbo.fAspcapElemErrs(a.aspcap_id) elemerrs WHERE (a.aspcapflag & dbo.fApogeeAspcapFlag(&&&)) = # and s.extratarg = # and s.field = M1#&&&
